subject: drowning practice
body: i'm thankful for [drowning practice](https://www.goodreads.com/en/book/show/58392925-drowning-practice) by mike meginnis which if you like the show _the leftovers_ (and not just the premise but the general texture and vibes) and/or helen dewitt's _the last samurai_ and/or _gilmore girls_ and/or people writing about their dreams (the book is about how one night everyone in the world has the exact same dream that the world is going to end in november of that year and the fallout of that for society living in the time that's left) and/or _kiss of the spiderwoman_ and/or drug use (and the use of other things as drugs) and/or alexandra kleeman's _you too can have a body like mine_ is a book that i read for most of the day today until there wasn't any more to read and i think you will enjoy.
normalized_markdown: i'm thankful for [drowning practice](https://www.goodreads.com/en/book/show/58392925-drowning-practice) by mike meginnis which if you like the show _the leftovers_ (and not just the premise but the general texture and vibes) and/or helen dewitt's _the last samurai_ and/or _gilmore girls_ and/or people writing about their dreams (the book is about how one night everyone in the world has the exact same dream that the world is going to end in november of that year and the fallout of that for society living in the time that's left) and/or _kiss of the spiderwoman_ and/or drug use (and the use of other things as drugs) and/or alexandra kleeman's _you too can have a body like mine_ is a book that i read for most of the day today until there wasn't any more to read and i think you will enjoy.
